comments.body: The impl doesn't match the godoc, and dropped support for reading public keys from private key blocks.
Was there a good reason not to use the existing impl as-is?

The comment was retained from the function it replaces here: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/41611/files#diff-cad4f907f9a840865e4ccf6d2bdf7e7bL90

However, looking over the code, as written does not actually parse out public keys from private key files.. it simply discards them as they wouldn't match "PUBLIC KEY" in the pem headers.

Fixing functionality to match intended function
the existing code did parse them... it didn't check block headers at all - https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/41611/files#diff-cad4f907f9a840865e4ccf6d2bdf7e7bL101
